message: Accept this offer and we can call it a day, or I'll make a counteroffer in the next round!
Let's split it evenly. Fair is fair!
You didn't accept my first offer, so I'm trying to be a bit more aggressive this time. Don't expect me to go easy on you!
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I think this is a fair deal.  Let's get this done.
You're getting a bit desperate, Bob. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to go easy on you. This is my final offer... for now.
We're getting close to the end, Alice. Let's make a deal before it's too late!
I'm not going to give up yet, Bob. You're running out of time. This is my best offer, but I'm willing to negotiate further if you're willing to meet me in the middle.
Alice, we're almost out of time!  I'm willing to give you the lion's share of the remaining money.  Let's call it a day.
